AVIDLY.HE.summary: Avidly Oyj operates as a digital sales and marketing agency in Finland, Germany, Denmark, Norway, Sweden, and internationally. It operates in two segments, Marketing Services and Inbound Marketing. The company operates a HubSpot marketing platform. It also provides inbound strategy and roadmap, Web designing and development, sales enablement, inbound and content marketing, video and conversational marketing, integration, brand creation, communication, marketing automation, and online and social media marketing services. The company was formerly known as Zeeland Family Oyj and changed its name to Avidly Oyj in September 2018. Avidly Oyj is based in Helsinki, Finland.
